sentences.en: He earned this position with his concise, forceful prose as well astumultuous, often newsworthy lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 他简洁有力的散文以及常受媒体关注的糜乱生活使他名闻遐迩.

sentences.en: It is this which makes chemical accidents so newsworthy . Fortunately, they are extremely rare.
sentences.cn: 这就是化工事故如此有新闻价值的原因, 但幸运的是这种事故极少发生.

sentences.en: The financial collapse has exposed newsworthy frauds, like the colossal Ponzi scheme run by Bernard Madoff.
sentences.cn: 金融危机暴露出了具有有新闻价值的商业欺诈行为, 例如有BernardMadoff操纵的旁氏骗局.

sentences.en: This situation might develop into an even more newsworthy item if the police were involved.
sentences.cn: 如果警方涉入的话，这个局面就会变得更有新闻价值了。

trans.tran_en: important or interesting enough to be reported in newspapers, on the radio, or on television
